1.0.name: wordpress/csv-sumotto
1.0.description: Plugin CSV Sumotto help WordPress users to place on your pages table from files CSV. Making the table is done with an editor, it is possible to choose the background color, font, font color and size, specify the scope and size of the cells, is also available merging cells. Content is taken directly from the file csv, so any changes to the file to be displayed in the table on your site.
